title: Asset Tokenization
summary: This course gives introduction to asset tokenization and also covers some of the platforms that can be used for the same
details:
# Coming Soon
This course will be release in next two weeks

explanations.details: Asset tokenization is the process of representing ownership of a physical or digital asset using a digital token on a blockchain. These tokens can be traded and transferred like other cryptocurrencies, allowing for more efficient and secure trading of assets such as real estate, fine art, and even stocks. Tokenization also allows for fractional ownership of assets, making them more accessible to a wider range of investors.
explanations.title: What is Asset Tokenization?
